report.title: Wavyish
report.author: Lelekuglamo
report.bodytext: Around two years ago I got interested in absinthe, and all the 'green fairy' tales. After researching Absinthe, its active substances, etc... I decided to try and smoke wormwood, to get a 'thujone' high. /n /n (first time) /n I did the 'thujone hash', and rolled it in a joint: the wormwood hash mixed with tobacco. /n - didn't really feel anything. /n /n (second time) /n I made more of the hash, but this time I smoked it almost pure in a joint. /n - no effect whatsoever /n /n (third time) /n This time I made around the same amout of hash as in the first time, but decided to smoke it in a pipe. /n I was convinced that nothing would happen, but here it goes. /n /n T+0:00 /n I put the hash on the pipe and off I went. The smoke was light and barely noticeable /n /n T+0:05 /n stopped smoking and went to the bathroom. When I open the door, the whole toilet looked like a sauna, it looked as if I had smoked in there. /n /n T+0:07 /n I turn on some music and lie in bed just mildly appreciating the music, and the curtains which appeared to move in a wavyish way. I felt really comfortable with the whole atmosphere. /n /n T+0:15 /n I sit on my chair to turn the music off, but the bass box seems to get larger, so I just stare at it trying to convince myself it's not growing. /n /n T+0:25 /n I feel normal again. /n /n My experience was pretty nice, but very short. I think that it worked better on the pipe rather than rolled.
